name: NewYorker
text: The study of Nazis still offers moral instruction on how evil arises. https://t.co/WzcaawN4gN

name: NewYorker
text: In a conversation with David Remnick, Masha Gessen discusses Donald Trump's autocratic mind-set. “Polarization and violence and high anxiety are all things that benefit an autocrat,” Gessen says. Listen here, or wherever you get your podcasts. https://t.co/eZBDvYurHI
